images.copyright: A herd of reindeer in Norway (© Lena Granefelt/plainpicture)
images.title: Dashing through the snow
images.caption: Dashing through the snow
images.desc: While many associate reindeer with the wonder of the Christmas holidays, these animals are magical in their own way. Known in North America as caribou, reindeer are well-adapted to live in cold, rugged Arctic regions. They're built to withstand frigid temperatures with the help of thick, dense fur and noses that warm the air before they breathe it in.

tooltips.walle: यह छवि वॉलपेपर के रूप में डाउनलोड करने के लिए उपलब्ध नहीं है.
tooltips.walls: इस छवि को डाउनलोड करें. इस छवि का उपयोग केवल वॉलपेपर तक प्रतिबंधित है.
